II.i.2.C.2.b
.
Handling Priority and Action Mail
ROs screen and process mail packages uploaded to the Centralized Mail (CM) portal.
Note
:  Compensation and pension mail received at ROs is shipped directly to the scanning vendors without prescreening.
References
:  For more information on
processing mail from members of Congress and other special controlled correspondence, see
M27-1, Part I, 5.3
claims requiring priority processing, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 1
procedures for processing CM packages, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.A.5.c
, and
receipt, separation, and routing of physical mail in the mailroom, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 1.A.2
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Mail Management
